name: HaveFun Karaoke & Outdoor Beer Garden (SAFRA Yishun)

reviews.text: I recently visited this amazing bar üç∏ and I'm excited to share my experience! The atmosphere was fantastic, with a lively yet intimate vibe ‚ú®.  I was impressed by the extensive drink menu, featuring unique cocktails and a wide selection of beers üçª. The bartenders were skilled and friendly, crafting each drink with precision and care.  The music was on point, creating the perfect backdrop for a fun night out üé∂. I also enjoyed the delicious bar snacks, which were perfectly paired with my drinks. The service was prompt and attentive, making me feel welcomed and valued as a customer. Overall, I highly recommend this bar for anyone looking for a great night out in the city üåÉ. I can't wait to go back again soon! #barreview #cocktails #nightlife

Food is decent, various selection of dishes. Service is on point, especially from Gladys, ensuring the satisfaction was on point from time to time. Weekends will have a slight slip, which is understandable. Prim and proper atmosphere. All in all, a 4/5 nonetheless

Service sucks. Waiter did not pass the promotion menu. Manager tried to argue his way out of it. Manager is a real gangster and ask what you trying to achieve out of your complaint. VER RUDE. Doubt the company cares if the manager is such a gangster and super defensive and tries to change the story to make it your fault. Manager insists waiter says he run out of menu and said will get back to us with the promo menu WHICH IS A LIE. Be mindful and make sure you ask for the promo menu which is half the price. They will just make it your fault. Their slogan, Good things happen is super ironic. While you are looking for a good time, be mindful this WILL not happen. Just look at the negative reviews.

Drinks are priced fairly, no service charge and gst! Food portion was reasonable and tasted nice, would recommend! The music and ambience was great as well, came here afew times for live music and karaoke. Should you wish to mingle and speak with your friends this isn't the place for you, as the music can be a tad bit too loud.
Love coming here! Staff are welcoming, great atmosphere & yummy food. The ktv system here is solid too. Highly recommended!!! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
